        public void initialize_hash()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Given the absolute path to the input file, read the contents initialize our hashmap. We will assume that the strings are case sensitive.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an IO error when trying to retrieve the file.
